title: NCAA, NHL 2020-21 Season, Peloton
itunes:title: NCAA, NHL 2020-21 Season, Peloton
description:
Bloomberg Opinion columnist (plus bestselling author and podcaster extraordinaire) Joe Nocera stops by to talk NCAA, plus Jason, Michael, and Mike Lynch discuss the Rose Bowl, the upcoming NHL season, and Peloton’s acquisition of Precor.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
